title: Gun shooting in a railway coach by Modi-Yogi supporter
selftext:
After the shoot the RPF constable goes onto say, vote for Modi and Yogi if you would like to stay India. 

This act of terrorism has killed one on duty superior officer and 3 civilians.

Watch the distressing video at your own will.
comments: This is the end result of the cult of Modi. Indians hunting each other while Modi enjoys his PMCARES fund.
New fear unlocked in Modi’s India.
